newsitem.title: ITALY: Bank of Italy sets $4.0 billion repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Italy sets $4.0 billion repo tender.

text.p: The Bank of Italy set an $4.0 billion repurchase tender for February 25 for resale on March 25.
The auction will be held tomorrow and the results will be announced soon afterwards.
The Bank said the lira/dollar rate on which the tender will be based will be announced tomorrow morning.
